original_text:
Dragon’s Inferno
Dragon’s Inferno, slot machine prodotta dalla software house Williams Interactive (WMS), propone ai giocatori un tema epico e un gioco avventuroso. Parliamo di draghi: protagonisti di tante belle leggende, si dice che i draghi fossero i custodi di grotte colme di oro e pietre preziose, e che difendessero questi tesori sputando fuoco e fiamme sugli intrepidi avventurieri che si muovevano alla conquista delle ricchezze.
Il tema di per sé non è particolarmente originale, sono diversi i giochi di slot che lo hanno proposto, però riteniamo che Dragon’s Inferno sia una slot molto piacevole da giocare e che dal punto di vista grafico sia strutturata in modo tale da rendere l’esperienza ludica abbastanza divertente e coinvolgente.
La schermata inziale si apre con una sorta di mare di lava su cui campeggia la figura di un drago, e le stesse tonalità dell’arancione brillante fanno da sfondo ai rulli nella schermata di gioco. I simboli sono riprodotti con sufficiente accuratezza e, nel complesso, la grafica di Dragon’s Inferno ricorda molto da vicino la famosa saga di Eragon.
Caratteristiche principali della slot
Dragon’s Inferno è una slot machine che conquisterà di certo gli amanti dei giochi di ruolo alla Dungeons and Dragons, in virtù di un gameplay molto ben organizzato e delle ottime possibilità di vincita! Partiamo dalla struttura, molto semplice e tradizionale: presenta cinque rulli e tre righe e si possono effettuare le scommesse su 30 linee di pagamento. Le paylines sono fisse, per cui si dovrà giocare su tutte le 30 linee insieme. La moneta su Dragon’s Inferno ha un valore compreso tra 0,01 e 3 €, e le scommesse vanno da un minimo di 30 centesimi fino a un massimo di 90 €.
Il ritorno teorico al giocatore (return to player o RTP) di questa slot di casa WMS si attesta su un non troppo convincente 95,97%, comunque in linea con gli altri giochi di questo provider.
Dragon’s Inferno può essere giocata sia da computer desktop che da tutti i dispositivi mobili, siano essi Android, iOS o Windows, e ci si può allenare senza investire dei soldi veri e senza dover scaricare nulla grazie alla modalità Play for Fun, disponibile nella maggior parte dei casinò online.
Simboli e funzionalità speciali di Dragon’s Inferno
I simboli di Dragon’s Inferno sono quasi interamente tematici, ad eccezione dei quattro semi delle carte da gioco (cuori, fiori, picche e denari). Sui rulli si alternano dei valorosi cavalieri, arcieri, degli elfi (o meglio, delle “elfe”) ma anche scrigni del tesoro, libri degli incantesimi, sfere di cristallo e pozioni.
Lo scrigno del tesoro è il Wild del gioco e sostituisce tutti gli altri simboli tranne lo Scatter, rappresentato invece dal drago.
Lo Scatter regala un numero di giri gratuiti veramente consistente, secondo il seguente schema: 3 Scatter attivano 10 Free Spins, 4 simboli Scatter attivano 20 Free Spins, mentre 5 Scatter attivano 40 Free Spins. Tutte le vincite durante i giri gratuiti sono soggette a un moltiplicatore 2X.
Da segnalare la funzione “Replicating Wild”: quando lo scrigno del tesoro determina una combinazione vincente, il drago emette un’enorme palla di fuoco che atterra sui rulli facendo diventare Wild il simbolo raggiunto.

raw_translation.response:
Dragon's Inferno
Dragon's Inferno, a slot machine produced by the software house Williams Interactive (WMS), offers players an epic theme and adventurous gameplay. We're talking about dragons: protagonists of many beautiful legends, it is said that dragons were the guardians of caves full of gold and precious stones, and that they defended these treasures by spitting fire and flames on intrepid adventurers who sought to conquer riches.
The theme itself is not particularly original, as there are several slot games that have featured it, but we believe that Dragon's Inferno is a very enjoyable slot to play and that, from a graphic point of view, it is structured in such a way as to make the gaming experience quite fun and engaging.
The initial screen opens with a sort of sea of lava with the figure of a dragon looming over it, and the same bright orange tones form the background for the reels in the game screen. The symbols are reproduced with enough accuracy and overall, the graphics of Dragon's Inferno closely resemble the famous Eragon saga.

Main features of the slot
Dragon's Inferno is a slot machine that will certainly appeal to Dungeons and Dragons role-playing game enthusiasts, thanks to its well-organized gameplay and excellent winning opportunities! Let's start with the structure, which is very simple and traditional: it has five reels and three rows, and bets can be placed on 30 paylines. The paylines are fixed, so you will have to play on all 30 lines together. The coin on Dragon's Inferno has a value ranging from €0.01 to €3, and bets range from a minimum of €0.30 to a maximum of €90.
The theoretical return to player (RTP) of this WMS slot machine is not particularly convincing at 95.97%, but it is in line with other games from this provider.
Dragon's Inferno can be played on both desktop computers and mobile devices, whether they are Android, iOS or Windows, and you can practice without investing real money or downloading anything thanks to the Play for Fun mode, available in most online casinos.

Symbols and special features of Dragon's Inferno
The symbols of Dragon's Inferno are almost entirely thematic, except for the four suits of playing cards (hearts, flowers, spades, and diamonds). The reels alternate with brave knights, archers, elves (or rather, "elfs"), but also treasure chests, spell books, crystal spheres, and potions.
The treasure chest is the game's Wild symbol and replaces all other symbols except the Scatter, which is represented by the dragon.
The Scatter gives a really substantial number of free spins, according to the following scheme: 3 Scatters activate 10 Free Spins, 4 Scatter symbols activate 20 Free Spins, while 5 Scatters activate 40 Free Spins. All winnings during free spins are subject to a 2X multiplier.
It is worth mentioning the "Replicating Wild" feature: when the treasure chest creates a winning combination, the dragon emits a huge fireball that lands on the reels and turns the symbol it reaches into a Wild.

Review: Dragon's Inferno
Dragon's Inferno, a slot machine produced by the software house Williams Interactive (WMS), offers players an epic theme and adventurous gameplay. We're talking about dragons: protagonists of many beautiful legends, it is said that dragons were the guardians of caves full of gold and precious stones, and that they defended these treasures by spitting fire and flames on intrepid adventurers who sought to conquer riches.
The theme itself is not particularly original, as there are several slot games that have featured it, but we believe that Dragon's Inferno is a very enjoyable slot to play and that, from a graphic point of view, it is structured in such a way as to make the gaming experience quite fun and engaging.
The initial screen opens with a sort of sea of lava with the figure of a dragon looming over it, and the same bright orange tones form the background for the reels in the game screen. The symbols are reproduced with enough accuracy and overall, the graphics of Dragon's Inferno closely resemble the famous Eragon saga.

Main features of the slot
Dragon's Inferno is a slot machine that will certainly appeal to Dungeons and Dragons role-playing game enthusiasts, thanks to its well-organized gameplay and excellent winning opportunities! Let's start with the structure, which is very simple and traditional: it has five reels and three rows, and bets can be placed on 30 paylines. The paylines are fixed, so you will have to play on all 30 lines together. The coin on Dragon's Inferno has a value ranging from €0.01 to €3, and bets range from a minimum of €0.30 to a maximum of €90.
The theoretical return to player (RTP) of this WMS slot machine is not particularly convincing at 95.97%, but it is in line with other games from this provider.
Dragon's Inferno can be played on both desktop computers and mobile devices, whether they are Android, iOS or Windows, and you can practice without investing real money or downloading anything thanks to the Play for Fun mode, available in most online casinos.

Symbols and special features of Dragon's Inferno
The symbols of Dragon's Inferno are almost entirely thematic, except for the four suits of playing cards (hearts, flowers, spades, and diamonds). The reels alternate with brave knights, archers, elves (or rather, "elfs"), but also treasure chests, spell books, crystal spheres, and potions.
The treasure chest is the game's Wild symbol and replaces all other symbols except the Scatter, which is represented by the dragon.
The Scatter gives a really substantial number of free spins, according to the following scheme: 3 Scatters activate 10 Free Spins, 4 Scatter symbols activate 20 Free Spins, while 5 Scatters activate 40 Free Spins. All winnings during free spins are subject to a 2X multiplier.
It is worth mentioning the "Replicating Wild" feature: when the treasure chest creates a winning combination, the dragon emits a huge fireball that lands on the reels and turns the symbol it reaches into a Wild.
